downloadTitle: Microsoft RMS SDK 4.2 for OS X
downloadDescription: Microsoft RMS SDK 4.2 for OS X is a lightweight SDK for creating rights-enabled applications. By downloading the software, you agree to the license terms provided for this software. If you do not agree to the license terms, please do not download the software.
detailsSection:
Microsoft RMS SDK 4.2 for OS X is a lightweight SDK for creating rights-enabled applications

What's new in SDK v4.2?
  • Updated telemetry pipeline
  • Added an option for apps to enable beta features in the SDK
  • Apps can now set the log level on the fly
  • Bitcode support
  • Better error handling for service interactions
  • Added revocation API to revoke published content (member method in the MSUserPolicy class)
    • Usage is just like register API (MSAsyncControl *)revokeSerializedPolicyWithUserId:(NSString *)userIdauthenticationCallback:(id<MSAuthenticationCallback>)authenticationCallback completionBlock:(void(^)(BOOL success, NSError *error))completionBlock;
  • Bug fixes
Our documentation has been updated where you can download the new SDKs, read about the new features, share your feedback, and find everything you need on our new documentation page here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/information-protection/develop/active-directory-rights-management-services-multi-platform-thin-client-sdk-portal

By downloading the software, you agree to the license terms provided for this software. If you do not agree to the license terms, please do not download the software.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Mac OS X 10.8 or above.
  • Xcode 5.0 that can be used to develop for OS X 10.8 or above.
